00056 namespace detail {
00058     struct base_random_generator {
00059         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00060         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00061         virtual ~base_random_generator() { }
00062     };
00063 
00065     template <class T>
00066     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00067         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00068         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00069         random_generator(T *g): genobj(g), gen(*g,
00070             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00071                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00072         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00073         std::auto_ptr<T> genobj;
00074         gen_t gen;
00075     };
00076 
00078     void set_random_generator(base_random_generator *obj);
00079 
00084     unsigned int get_random();
00085 } // namespace detail

00104 template <typename T>
00105 void set_random_generator(T *gen) {
00106     detail::random_generator<T> *obj=new detail::random_generator<T>(gen);
00107     detail::set_random_generator(obj);
00108 }
